 Indicates the start angle of the scan (This is useful for partial scans).

Detailed Description

A structure for aggregating the data that define a scan profile obtained from reply B0 (See page 49 Telegram listing).

uint8_t SickToolbox::SickLMS::sick_lms_scan_profile_b0_tag::sick_real_time_scan_index

If real-time scan indices are requested, this value is set (modulo 256).
